name: Zebra Cake
description: A visually impressive cake, with a zebra effect in every slice.

instructions.text: Whisk the sugar, eggs, and vanilla in a large bowl.
Add the oil and milk, continue mixing.
Add the baking powder, salt, and flour. Mix until you get a smooth batter.
Divide the batter into two equal parts. Add the cocoa powder to one half and mix well.
In a buttered pan, place a small amount of plain batter in the centre. Add a small amount of cocoa batter on top. Repeat the process, alternating the batters, until used up.
Place heaped tablespoons of batter onto ungreased baking trays, spacing them 5 cm apart.

tips: Insert a toothpick or a knife into the centre of the cake to check doneness
Let cool before removing from the pan to prevent it from breaking
For a more intense flavour, add a teaspoon of coffee extract to the cocoa batter
You can decorate the top of the cake with chocolate icing or icing sugar
